Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: raccoon snout
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A snout with a nose always in a rubbish bin.

values.description: A short, pointed, and bandit-masked muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away. Eating is easier, but speaking is harder.

A short, pointed, and bandit-masked muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away. Adaptation has removed all of the difficulty with speaking.
A short, pointed, bandit-masked impressive muzzle has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s usual face. [PAWN_possessive] keen nose picks up the smell of rubbish from miles away.

Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: raccoon ear
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: A short and fuzzy round ears of a raccoon.

values.description: A short and fuzzy round ear has replaced [PAWN_nameDef]'s normal ear.
The ringtail of a raccoon has grown out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. It twitches when it senses rubbish.
